sentence: Former Vice President Mike Pence placed third with ten percent support, followed by former U.S. ambassador to the U.N. Nikki Haley (8 percent), Rep. Liz Cheney (8 percent), and Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX): That survey also found Trump leading President Biden by four percentage points 47 percent to 43 percent.
author: Hannah Bleau
title: Poll: Majority Support Trump in Republican Primary
